  </strong>

  <label><input type="radio" name="module4_mcq_q91" value="A"> A. CAPM cannot be applied when a firm has multinational operations.</label><br>

  <label><input type="radio" name="module4_mcq_q91" value="D"> D. By using only U.S. proxies, the firm ignores that the true market portfolio includes global risk factors, not just U.S. ones.</label><br>
